price: আল্লাহৰ তৰফৰ পৰা এজন ৰাছুল, যিজনে তিলাৱত কৰি শুনাব পৱিত্ৰ পত্ৰসমূহ,
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
